main.description: A hypercert record tracking impact work.

shortDescription.description: Short blurb of the impact work done.

description.description: Optional longer description of the impact work done.

image.description: The hypercert visual representation as a URI or blob

evidence.description: Supporting evidence, documentation, or external data URIs

items.description: A strong reference to the evidence that supports this impact claim. The record referenced must conform with the org.hypercerts.claim.evidence lexicon

contributions.description: A strong reference to the contributions done to create the impact in the hypercerts. The record referenced must conform with the lexicon org.hypercerts.claim.contributions

rights.description: A strong reference to the rights that this hypercert has. The record referenced must conform with the lexicon org.hypercerts.claim.rights

location.description: A strong reference to the location where the work for done hypercert was located. The record referenced must conform with the lexicon org.hypercerts.claim.location

createdAt.description: Client-declared timestamp when this record was originally created
